column1: The woman was fighting a demon when Aragon came.,"The woman moving backwards, fighting a demon.",The [woman.png] moves backwards from the right side of the screen while engaged in a battle with the [demon.png].,"<svg xmlns=""http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"" xmlns:xlink=""http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"" width=""800"" height=""600"">
<image class=""woman"" xlink:href=""woman.png"" width=""200"" height=""200"" x=""600"" y=""200"" />
<image class=""demon"" xlink:href=""demon.png"" width=""200"" height=""200"" x=""0"" y=""200"" />
<image class=""woman"" xlink:href=""woman.png"" x=""0"" y=""0"" width=""200"" height=""200""/>
<image xlink:href=""The woman.png"" x=""800"" y=""250"" width=""200"" height=""300"" id=""woman"" />
<image xlink:href=""the demon.png"" x=""400"" y=""250"" width=""200"" height=""300"" id=""demon"" />
<animate xlink:href=""#woman"" attributeName=""x"" from=""800"" to=""-200"" dur=""5s"" repeatCount=""indefinite"" />

,1
She had a book in her hand and was casting spells.,Woman moving her hand, casting spells.",[hand.png] moves in front of [woman.png] as she gestures and casts spells.,"<svg xmlns=""http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"" xmlns:xlink=""http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"" viewBox=""0 0 800 600"">
<!-- Define the woman's gestures and spell casting -->
<!-- Add your desired gestures and spell casting animations here -->
<image xlink:href=""hand.png"" x=""400"" y=""0"" width=""400"" height=""600"" style=""opacity:0
<image xlink:href=""hand.png"" width=""200"" height=""200"" x=""400"" y=""200"" opacity=""0"">
<animate id=""gestureAnimation"" attributeName=""x"" from=""400"" to=""600"" begin=""handAnimation.end"" dur=""2s"" fill=""freeze"" />
<animate attributeName=""opacity"" from=""1"" to=""0"" begin=""gestureAnimation.end"" dur=""1s"" fill=""freeze"" />

,2
Aragorn grabbed his sword and threw it at the demon.,Aragorn moving his arm, throwing his sword at the demon.","[aragorn.png] moves his arm from the right side of the screen and throws [sword.png] towards the left side of the screen, aiming at [demon.png].","<svg xmlns=""http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"" xmlns:xlink=""http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"" width=""800"" height=""600"">
<image xlink:href=""aragorn.png"" x=""0"" y=""150"" width=""150"" height=""200"" id=""aragorn"" />
<image xlink:href=""sword.png"" x=""700"" y=""150"" width=""100"" height=""100"" id=""sword"" />
<image xlink:href=""demon.png"" x=""350"" y=""150"" width=""150"" height=""200"" id=""demon"" />
type=""translate"" from=""0 0"" to=""400 0"" dur=""2s"" begin=""0s"" fill=""freeze"" />
type=""translate"" from=""0 0"" to=""-700 0"" dur=""2s"" begin=""0s"" fill=""freeze"" />
<image xlink:href=""aragorn.png"" x=""0"" y=""200"" width=""200"" height=""200"" id=""aragorn"" />
<image xlink:href=""sword.png"" x=""800"" y=""300"" width=""100"" height=""100"" id=""sword"" visibility=""hidden"" />
<image xlink:href=""demon.png"" x=""600"" y=""200"" width=""200"" height=""200"" id=""demon"" />
